name: Quickfang
flavor_text: My smile is full of blades.

frame.name: Lightweight Frame
frame.description:
[Heavy Attack]  : Launch a heavy dash attack.
Heavy attacks are stronger with full energy.

perks.description: Greatly increased sword ammo at the cost of damage.
perks.name: Enduring Blade

perks.description: Increased damage at the cost of sword ammo.
perks.name: Jagged Edge

perks.description: Sword Guard has low overall defenses, but increases charge rate.
perks.name: Swordmaster's Guard

perks.description: Sword ammo granted for every other powered sword kill.
perks.name: Tireless Blade

perks.description: [Light Attack]  : Landing three light-attack hits within a short time grants Sword ammo.
perks.name: Relentless Strikes

perks.description: Guarding while receiving damage generates class ability energy.
perks.name: Energy Transfer

perks.description: Killing combatants with this weapon generates a small amount of Super energy.
perks.name: Thresh

perks.description: Sword Kills boost movement speed and damage.
perks.name: Assassin's Blade

perks.description: Quick attacks immediately after swapping to this sword do additional damage.
perks.name: En Garde

perks.description: Melee blocked immediately after guarding disorients and weakens the attacker.
perks.name: Flash Counter

perks.description: Hitting three separate targets increases damage for a moderate duration.
perks.name: One for All
